articles.title: Sapporo to Sell Real-Estate Business to KKR-PAG Consortium

articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Sapporo to Sell Real-Estate Business to KKR-PAG Consortium. The consortium agreed to buy the Japanese beer makerâ€™s real-estate subsidiary valued around $3 billion. Related tickers mentioned: KKR, KKR-PD, SOOBF.

articles.title: Reddit Stock Is Ready to Run Again
articles.mainIdea: Reddit Stock Is Ready to Run Again
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Reddit Stock Is Ready to Run Again. Shares of Reddit have soared more than 400% since their debut last spring. Just wait until next year. Related tickers mentioned: META, RDDT, ^GSPC, ^IXIC.

articles.title: 2025 Changed the Media Business. Next Year Could Be Even More Turbulent.
articles.mainIdea: 2025 Changed the Media Business. Next Year Could Be Even More Turbulent.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: 2025 Changed the Media Business. Next Year Could Be Even More Turbulent.. Headlines regarding the battle for Warner Bros. just scratch the surface of how busy this year has been for the media industry. Related tickers mentioned: NFLX, VSNTV, WBD.
